thread.title: Woman arrested for having sex with dog on social media | New York Post
thread.title_full: Woman arrested for having sex with dog on social media | New York Post

author: Jackie Salo
title: Woman arrested for having sex with dog on social media | New York Post
text:
A Mississippi woman accused of having sex with a dog on social media has been arrested.
Amy Graves, 43, was charged on Tuesday with unnatural intercourse and bestiality. The arrest came after authorities received a tip through Crime Stoppers about a video publicly posted online of the alleged sex act, according to Lamar County Sheriff’s Office. 
It has not been determined who posted the video to social media.
“We were able to download pictures from that website that depicted the incident and through the investigation, we were able to identify that it was her,” Sheriff Danny Rigel told The Post.
Authorities then obtained a search warrant for Graves’ home in Hattiesburg, Mississippi, where she was arrested.
“We determined that residence was where the film had been made,” Rigel said.
Graves is being held in Lamar County Jail, where she awaits to be arraigned. If convicted, Graves faces up to 10 years in jail and would have to register as a sex offender.
The large mixed-breed dog was placed in the care of a relative.
According to Rigel, such cases are rare in the south Mississippi town.
“I’ve been doing this for 35 years and this is the first I’ve ever prosecuted for this particular crime,” he said.
